page.title: 06 Village Organisations(2)
page.content: Wind Mill Club The Wind Mill Club provides companion- ship,entertainment and interests in happy surroundings on a self-basis to the elderly. ----------------- Parent Teacher Organisation The Parent Teacher Organisation helps to raise money for the school trips,parties the computers and for other school things. ------------------ Memorial Hall Management Committee They raise money for the Memorial Hall repairs and they are responsible for anything to do withthe Hall and keeping everything in order.
